code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function UploadPage(){const[selectedFiles,setSelectedFiles]=useState(null);const handleFileChange=event=>{setSelectedFiles(event.target.files);};const handleUpload=async event=>{event.preventDefault();if(setSelectedFiles.length===0)return;const formData=new FormData();Array.from(selectedFiles).forEach(file=>{formData.append("files",file);});try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/upload",{method:"POST",body:formData});if(response.ok){console.log("File uploaded successfully!");}else{console.error("File upload failed.");}}catch(error){console.error("Error uploading file:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleUpload,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",id:"fileInput",multiple:true,onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Upload"})]}),selectedFiles&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Selected file: ",selectedFiles.name]})]});}export default UploadPage;
